marklogic.body: Actually if you look at his strikeout to walks ratio, and the fact that his fastball is clocked at 98 mph, its a great acquistion, again, by the Blue Jays, I am sure the brain trust, which you can trust, unlike the leafs, have a nose for talent! and will pick his Spots, Spring Training is for working the bugs out, maybe he is working on a new pitch, (split finger)Â Â preparing for the season, should he try it when the games mean something? Batista has had a lousy spring training! should they send him down? people should think, and do a little research, get educatedÂ before stating comments, 8.68 Era, spring training, WFC
